thread.section_title: The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, just an okay hotel. Much better available in the area
thread.title_full: Good location, just an okay hotel. Much better available in the area - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: WorldTravelerDC1
title: Good location, just an okay hotel. Much better available in the area
text:
We stayed at that hotel for a romantic getaway and got a room with the view of Central Park. The room was great, big and with a nice mini bar. The view was not great at all. If you're looking for a room with a great view of Central Park you should consider the Trump International Hotel which is just two blocks away.
The service at the hotel was very good.
